```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("dplyr")
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
DF1 <- read.csv("swirl-data.csv", header = TRUE)
DF2 <- select(DF1, one_of(c("hash", "lesson_name", "attempt")))
View(DF2)
DF3 <- DF2 %>% group_by(hash, lesson_name) %>% summarise(sum(attempt))
View(DF3)
```
